main.py.name: Main
main.py.description: runs every module and compiles a .pdf output for review.

module_inputs.json.name: module_inputs
module_inputs.json.description: a internal database - that the script will use to select active/inactive modules. Update this manually by reading me pasting int in.

00.0A.name: cover_generator
00.0A.description: have a very python submodule to make the cover. where it can be arranged. Cover Title: Michael Logan Maloney PhD. Dissertation Notebook. Report Generated on DATE XXXX.

00.0B.name: table of contents generator
00.0B.description: Table of Contents of the PDF run. Based on Active/Inactive Column Google Sheet.

01.00.name: J1 - Journal 1
01.00.description: The first Journal Paper. This will be the most important. As much of the future work will look at this as a base.

01.0A.name: Abstract
01.0A.description: Contain a working title and working abstract of what the work is, which must clearly identify what is the current state of the art, what are its deficiencies, what methods have been applied, what are the results, and what is the lasting contribution of the submission.

01.0C.name: Problem System Model
01.0C.description: Problem System Model - Download Link: https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1Mx3Uug0W3zOUvEeE9tmppbM0gTn-0mD_vgZJv6hXcCo/edit. Insert png into pdf as Figure.
